thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Wayne O Connor
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Wayne O Connor

author: Wayne O Connor
title: Wayne O Connor
text: Rather than advising product was not in stock, girl in Wexford store apologised not currently in stock, but straight away showed me her iPad and advised can order in and will be in shop within 2 days. Really impressed with the facility to order stock that quickly firstly, but most importantly the attitude of the assistant, very friendly manor and clearly interested in my business. Really positive experience all round. Product collected 2 days later by a very happy customer !!
